infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to take photos for journal entries.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record audio notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for journal entries.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Journal Tracking to access your photos.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow Journal Tracking to save photos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Journal Tracking to access your camera.
